summary: Mobile speech-to-text feature with an added UI cue indicating when the microphone is actively listening.

existing_features.title: Enhance the voice dictation UI so it provides a clear, subtle visual cue when the microphone is actively listening (i.e., SpeechRecognition has started), beyond the current icon pulse, and ensure the cue is visible in all places the VoiceDictationButton is used (e.g., AddTaskDialog and EditTaskDialog dictation controls).
Add accessibility semantics for the listening state on the dictation control so assistive technologies can detect when dictation is active.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a subtle UI cue/indicator when the mic is actively listening during mobile speech-to-text.

projectName: Add clear UI indicator when voice dictation microphone is actively listening
